step_feedback.feedback: Good start! Try to bring your shoulder blades back and down a bit more smoothly.
Excellent! You're really getting the circular motion. Keep that gentle squeeze.
Great job completing the first set! Remember to breathe deeply as you roll back.
Nice continuation. Focus on keeping the movement controlled and fluid.
Very good! You're maintaining good form and range of motion.
Fantastic finish to the second set! You're doing great with these shoulder rolls.

exercise_summary: You're doing a great job with the shoulder rolls! Remember to gently squeeze your shoulder blades back and down in a smooth, circular motion. Breathing deeply as you roll back helps improve oxygen flow. Keep up the excellent work!
